meta.dc:title: HR 4258 ENR: Reauthorizing Security for Supreme Court Justices Act of 2019
meta.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
meta.dc:creator: Xcential BillDTD to USLM Converter v20200824
meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America

To authorize the Marshal of the Supreme Court and the Supreme Court Police to protect the Justices, employees, and official guests of the Supreme Court outside of the Supreme Court grounds, and for other purposes.

main.name: HR4258

content.p: To authorize the Marshal of the Supreme Court and the Supreme Court Police to protect the Justices, employees, and official guests of the Supreme Court outside of the Supreme Court grounds, and for other purposes.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: Short title.
section.content: This Act may be cited as the “Reauthorizing Security for Supreme Court Justices Act of 2019”.

section.heading: Protection authority of Marshal of the Supreme Court and Supreme Court Police.
section.chapeau: Section 6121 of title 40, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.content: in paragraph (2), in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), by striking “any State” and inserting “any location”; and

clause.content: by striking “violation of federal or state law” and inserting “violation of Federal or State law”; and
by striking “regulation under federal or state law” and inserting “regulation under Federal or State law”; and

subparagraph.content: by striking “Additional requirements” and all that follows through “Duties under” and inserting “Authorization To carry firearms—Duties under”; and
by striking “any State” and inserting “any location”.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
